name: Non-Friction Delivery
description:
As the latest Explosive Inc. employee, we welcome you to what will surely be a long* and healthy** career in our explosive delivery warehouse. You will be provided with Perfectly Safe Technology’s™ latest anti-friction gun to transport crates of our flagship product, the highly volatile at room temperature “Kaboom 2”, from the end of the production line to the waiting, shielded and refrigerated delivery truck before the “Kaboom 2” gets too hot. Thanks to our generous life insurance policy, you can earn a substantial bonus over your base pay for each successful delivery!

Controls: Controller (Recommended):
  • Left stick - Move
  • Right Stick - Look
  • A (South) Button - Jump
  • X (East) Button - Change Surface Friction
  • Y (North) Button -  Destroy Crate (if it gets stuck)
Mouse/Keyboard:
  • ASDF - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • E - Change Surface Friction
  • Space - Jump
  • T - Destroy Crate (if it gets stuck)
Instructions:
  • Push the crate to the goal within the time limit, avoiding sending it and you over the edge or getting caught in the smashers.
  • Some surfaces have high friction. Other surfaces are slippery.
  • Surfaces that highlight can have their friction changed.
  • The crate is too heavy to push on grey surfaces but is hard to control on blue surfaces.
  • Surface friction affects the player too!
